title: Fix lobby ready state sync between host and guest
description: When players click Ready in lobby, the state is not syncing properly between host and guest browsers. Host's ready state doesn't propagate to server, guest's ready state doesn't show on host.

comments.author: coleschaffer
comments.text: Found root cause: networkMiddleware was never added to Redux store. Fixed by adding .concat(networkMiddleware) to store configuration. Also fixed hostManager.broadcastLobbyState() which was incorrectly wrapping lobby messages as GAME_ACTION.

comments.author: coleschaffer
comments.text: Fixed isHost detection: LOBBY_STATE handler now sets localPlayerId from partyClient before syncing, ensuring proper host detection.
